name: assault-vest
effect: Raises the holder’s Special Defense to 1.5×. Prevents the holder from selecting a status move.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Special Defense to 1.5×. Prevents the holder from selecting a status move.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.
